h1. Storage Deck

The Storage Deck provides you with a secure, distributed storage solution with an Object Gateway S3 API.

Each Cloud Space is activated with a S3 capacity of 1GB. Contact [Support|http://support.mothership1.com/open.php] and go to the Service Deck to upgrade your S3 capacity. Check [here|Pricing] the pricing for extra S3 capacity.

{{html:
	<div ng-controller="StorageController">

		<a href="" ng-click="showKeys()">Show S3 keys</a>

	    <table class="table table-striped table-bordered" ng-cloak>
	    <tr>
	      <th>S3 Bucket</th>
	      <th>S3 Server</th>
	    </tr>
	    <tbody>
	      <tr ng-repeat="storage in storages">
		<td>{[ storage.name ]}</td>
	        <td>{[ storage.s3url ]}</td>
	      </tr>
	    </tbody>
	  </table>
	</div>


<script type="text/ng-template" id="showCredentialsModal.html">
        <div class="modal-header">
            <h3>S3 Credentials</h3>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
                <div ng-model="accesskey" class="row-fluid">
                    <div class="span3">Access Key:</div><div>{[ accesskey ]}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid" ng-model="secretkey">
                    <div class="span3">Secret Key:</div><div>{[ secretkey ]}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid" ng-model="s3server">
                    <div class="span3">S3 Server:</div><div>{[ s3server ]}</div>
                </div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">

            <button class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="close()">Close</button>
        </div>
    </script>

  <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/StorageService.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
  <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/Storage/StorageController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
